content: We call upon our neighbor Red for a high-level meeting to discuss historical tensions regarding territorial boundaries between us. It would be useful for both nations to engage in bilateral discussions before making statements or taking actions on this matter.

As a continuation of our long-standing partnership based on shared values like democracy and common interests including security cooperation, we request our strategic partner Blue for a ministerial visit by its political leadership.
We want to have good relations with you in the future. We are willing to work together in order to advance your interests but I am not comfortable with you expanding your territory into our land.
